contextual_notes: The user seems to be seeking practical, step-by-step guidance for teaching a non-technical person.
Initial dissatisfaction may stem from repetitive or unclear responses.
general_insights: Users appreciate clear, step-by-step instructions, especially for technical tasks.
Providing beginner-friendly recommendations can significantly improve user satisfaction.
Avoiding repetition and directly addressing user queries can prevent dissatisfaction.
